Params: {3: 'They arrive to discover a boy half kneeling on the floor, covered in deep gashes—'}
{3: 'His silvery black mechanical frame is exposed, and the air is filled with the smell of vital fluid. It is deeply disturbing.'}
{3: 'Despite not relenting in his words, Changyu seems relieved to find someone here to rescue him. Losing that last bit of strength, he no longer can support himself and falls.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "...I didn't ask for your help this way. This position might be a little bit too..."}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Shut up, or you'll bite your tongue—"}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Golden Apple... I see. Sophia is also a Support-type Construct.'}
{2: "You've heard of that system?", 3: '19', 4: "Wasn't she dual-wielding pistols like you?", 5: '20'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I read it in the Babylonia database. A support system themed after harvests, I didn't expect it to be applied to a frame of another type."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I always find that designation insulting... The weapons you use don't define what type of Construct you are."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "...Can't believe I need to be saved by the Babylonians.", 4: '2'}
